item.title: Probability Function
item.description: Probability function is the function of a random variable distribution, whose value provides the absolute or relative likelihood of the value of the random variable in the sample. Depending on the type of our random variable, we can calculate: Absolute likelihood for a discrete variable Relative likelihood for a continuous variable On this page we will discuss: Probability Mass Function Probability Density Function Popular PMFs and PDFs Probability Mass Function Discrete random variables have discrete and countable values.
